title: ca. 1920 Columbia University Baseball Field Postcard
author: IronHorse2130

posts.post_title: ca. 1920 Columbia University Baseball Field Postcard
posts.post_content:
Sold an example a few months ago and just found another one! A nice, unused postcard showing Columbia University's baseball field. Circa 1920 when Lou Gehrig played there.

Not sure why my scanner cut the borders off but they are not trimmed as they appear to be in the photo!

$12 shipped.
I WILL TAKE IT........... PAY PAL ok??
